title: CircleCI launches dedicated hosts for macOS development
content:
CircleCI announced on Wednesday that it is now offering dedicated hosts for macOS development on its platform. Developers who build apps for Apple’s operating systems can now have access to macOS host machines to automate stages of the app development process.

more…

The post CircleCI launches dedicated hosts for macOS development appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Developers can now have access to macOS host machines on CircleCI to automate stages of the app development process.
